name: Breathe (itch) (kaiserMorgan)
description:
Breathe is a game where the aim is to take a moment. Just be.
Hold the space bar.
Just watch.
Let go of the space bar.
Just watch.

Credits:

Original concept, design, animation and artworks by Morgan Meehan-Lam
Sound Editing - Matthew Meehan-Lam

Additional coding and resources from the Mercurial Collective:
Georgia Cutajar, Chase Ehrenberg, Kiri Wright

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“

Audio Hero - Meadow, spring, environment, ambience

Backing Music from https://www.jamendo.com/track/278262/fun-music\

fun music (2009) - Manu le Coq
